learningpod.title: Kaplan Kids (Reading): If the Latin root agri means "fields," what do you think the word agriculture means?

p.b: If the Latin root agri means "fields," what do you think the word agriculture means?

simpleChoice.p: the art and science of painting and sculpture
the art of playing outdoor sports
the science of the oceans and marine life
the art and science of raising crops and animals
